Version: 3.1.0
Build id: 200412210800

EMF 2.1.0

I found this while playing with WebTools 1.0 M2, but it is reproducible with a
simple EMF example.

Test:
1. Create a new EMF project
2. Create an example ECore model (any type will do)
3. Open the model it created.  Should display in the standard model editor
4. Right click on the title of the editor.  CCE should appear in the log
